title: Roast Winter Squash Wedges with Optional Cheese Herb Crust

instructions.default: Bake on a sheet at 350 for 10 min or until warm. For more color, bake longer.
instructions.Frozen Pint: Defrost. Bake at 350 for 10 min or until warm. For more color, bake longer.
instructions.Frozen Pint / VEGAN: Defrost. Bake at 350 for 10 min or until warm. For more color, bake longer.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Cheese: Defrost. Bake at 350 for 10 min or until warm. For more color, bake longer.
